name: Pixel Machines (itch)
description:
Your task is to paint a picture using bullets.

Mouse scroll to rotate objects. ESC for pause menu

This is a prototype, only show how it would work. I plan to update this stuff regularly.

Play in browser or download the exe file.

You can give me feedback in the link below:

https://forms.gle/FP6HxdZVyjzLdbed9
